metadata.title: CVE-2022-29583 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** service_windows.go in the kardianos service package for Goomits quoting that is sometimes needed for execution of a Windows serviceexecutable from the intended directory. NOTE: this finding could not bereproduced by its original reporter or by others.

criterions.comment: google-guest-agent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
